template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" app:layout_behavior="@string/appbar_scrolling_view_behavior">
<FrameLayout android:layout_above="@+id/rl_ad_banner" android:id="@+id/content" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent"> </FrameLayout>
<RelativeLayout android:id="@+id/rl_ad_banner" android:layout_alignParentBottom="true" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content"/> </RelativeLayout>

template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="vertical">
<Button android:id="@+id/btn_update" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:text="@string/update" android:textAllCaps="false" android:padding="@dimen/padding_16dp" android:background="@color/colorAccent"/>
</LinearLayout>

denFragmentListAdapter
denFragmentListAdapterXml
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:card_view="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/card_view" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="5dp" android:elevation="2dp" card_view:cardBackgroundColor="@color/themeBackgroundCardColor" card_view:cardCornerRadius="2dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal">
<TextView android:id="@+id/adp_v_indicator" android:layout_width="5dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#00ba90" />
<RelativeLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_weight="1">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_toLeftOf="@+id/iv_delete" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="10dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@color/themeTextColor" android:textSize="16sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvSubTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@color/themeHintColor" android:layout_marginTop="5dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvPages" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@color/themeHintColor" android:layout_marginTop="5dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_delete" android:layout_width="50dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:layout_alignParentRight="true" android:layout_centerInParent="true" android:padding="10dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_pdf_delete" /> </RelativeLayout> </LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</LinearLayout>

template.name: denFragmentListActivityXml
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/themeWindowBackground">
<androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_above="@+id/ad_view_top">
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recycler_view" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:paddingTop="8dp">
</androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView>
<include layout="@layout/base_layout_no_data" /> </androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout>
<RelativeLayout android:id="@+id/ad_view_top" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_alignParentBottom="true" android:layout_centerHorizontal="true" /> </RelativeLayout>
